thread.title: Celebs celebrate Spirit Day to fight against bullying
thread.title_full: Celebs celebrate Spirit Day to fight against bullying

title: Celebs celebrate Spirit Day to fight against bullying
text: Celebs celebrate Spirit Day to fight against bullying Friday, 16 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) *Washington D.C., Oct. 16(ANI): Not only the people around the world are coming together against bullying and celebrating the Spirit Day, but also the Hollywood celebs are doing the same and are showing off as much purple as they can.* Washington D.C., Oct. 16(ANI): Not only the people around the world are coming together against bullying and celebrating the Spirit Day, but also the Hollywood celebs are doing the same and are showing off as much purple as they can. The holiday has been celebrated every third Thursday in October since 2010 as a way to remember young people, who have taken their lives and committed suicide due to bullying, reports E! Online. Laverne Cox took to her Instagram page and posted a picture of herself that was hued purple and "I'm against bullying" was written on it. Caitlyn Jenner showed her support with a picture, in which she flaunts her purple coloured nails, captioning it, "I'm joining @glaad and taking a stand against bullying for #SpiritDay!" Meanwhile, Britney Spears took to Twitter and wrote, "@jowenwillis This makes me sooo happy! See you tonight for @glaad #SpiritDay!!" (ANI)
